gmc_hdfs.replicationsimulator

Class DataitemsMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • gmc_hdfs.replicationsimulator.DataitemsMap

  • public class DataitemsMap
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements A map for storing information about data items

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataitemsMap(int datacenterId)
      Takes a data center's ID and create a object of DataitemsMap for it

    • Method Detail

      • contain

        public boolean contain(int dataitemId)
        This method identifies whether the map has the data with daraitemId or not.
        Parameters:
        dataitemId - ID of data item
        Returns:
        true, if map contain data item which identified by dataitemId else return false

      • addReadInfo

        public void addReadInfo(User user,
               int dataitemId)
        For each read request for data from the users for the store data, it increases the number of requests.
        Parameters:
        user - User who sent request
        dataitemId - ID of data item

      • removeNode

        public boolean removeNode(BlockInfo b,
                 DatanodeInfo node)
        It removes the node information from the set of block b storing nodes. This occurs when the data migrates from the node of it is deleted of the node is damaged.
        Parameters:
        b - BlockInfo
        node - DatanodeInfo
        Returns:
        true, if success
